funFacts.title: Pig Latin's Secret History
funFacts.content: Did you know Pig Latin was once called 'hog latin' in 1895? I love how old-school it sounds! VibeTrans lets you translate this quirky language effortlessly, adding a touch of nostalgia.

funFacts.title: Hollywood's Pig Latin Love
funFacts.content: Pig Latin appeared in a 1952 Disney short! I think it's wild how this playful language has entertained from cartoons to classrooms. VibeTrans brings that fun to your fingertips.

items.title: Effortless Large Text Translation
items.content: Ever felt stuck translating a whole book into Pig Latin? VibeTrans can handle large documents with ease. Upload your docx or txt files, and it converts everything in one go. I find this feature super handy for long scripts or novels.

items.title: Preserve Punctuation Perfectly
items.content: Keeping punctuation intact while translating is a common headache. With VibeTrans, 'Hello, world!' stays exactly that, with commas and exclamations right where they should be. I love how it respects my writing style without any fuss.

items.title: Audio Learning for Fun
items.content: Want to hear Pig Latin aloud? VibeTrans offers TTS reading, making it easier to master pronunciation. It's like having a personal tutor! I enjoy listening while I work, adding a playful twist to my day.

items.title: Gaming Your Way to Fluency
items.content: Turn learning into play with VibeTrans's game mode. Guess Pig Latin translations and climb the leaderboard. It's perfect for kids and adults alike! I believe this makes language learning feel like a fun adventure.
